definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
neck/collar/to lead/to receive/classifier for clothes, mats, screens etc
south of the five ranges/old term for south China, esp. Guangdong and Guangxi
Badaling, a particular section of the Great Wall that is a favorite tourist destination
Qinling mountain range in Shaanxi forming natural barrier between Guanzhong plain 關中平原|关中平原[Guan1 zhong1 ping2 yuan2] and Han River 漢水|汉水[Han4 shui3] valley
Tieling prefecture level city in Liaoning province 遼寧省|辽宁省 in northeast China/also Tieling county
Daxing'anling mountain range in northwest Heilongjiang province 黑龍江|黑龙江[Hei1 long2 jiang1] in northeast China/Daxing'anling prefecture
Changling county in Songyuan 松原, Jilin
Wenling county level city in Taizhou 台州[Tai1 zhou1], Zhejiang
to pass over mountains ridges (idiom); fig. hardships of the journey
Wenling county level city in Taizhou 台州[Tai1 zhou1], Zhejiang
Nanling mountain, on the border of Hunan, Jiangxi, Guangdong and Guangxi
Tieling prefecture level city in Liaoning province 遼寧省|辽宁省 in northeast China

sentences.english: The steel fiber concrete is used to strengthening the dam through more schemes comparison.
sentences.chinese: 經比選佛子嶺大壩加固採用鋼纖維混凝土新材料。

sentences.english: The old road beside the waterfall place is Jianguo Ridge, leading to Jianguo Village at the hill above.
sentences.chinese: 瀑布羣旁就是建國嶺，通往山頂的建國村。

sentences.english: Hacksaw Ridge and Lion also received six nods.
sentences.chinese: 《血戰鋼鋸嶺》和《雄獅》也獲得六項提名。

sentences.english: Little white received a mysterious message, he sent his old monkey led to the tripterygium wilfordii ridge.
sentences.chinese: 少白收到了神祕電報，他派老猴子帶隊前往雷公嶺。

sentences.english: The south area of Zhaoyuan is situated at between terrace Chaoyanggou and anticlinal belt Changchunling.
sentences.chinese: 肇源南地區位於朝陽溝階地和長春嶺背斜帶之間。

sentences.english: The Fortunate Life Ridge station platform is narrow, dusky and exceptionally quiet.
sentences.chinese: 地鐵福壽嶺站站臺狹窄，光線昏暗，安靜異常。

sentences.english: My new school's name is Maple Ridge Elementary School.
sentences.chinese: 我的新學校的名字叫楓樹嶺學校。

sentences.english: The Huang-yang-lin antimony deposit is newly discovered and is located in the hinterland of the Xinjiang Kunlun Mountains.
sentences.chinese: 黃羊嶺銻礦牀是新疆崑崙山腹地新發現的銻礦產地。

sentences.english: A precious Darjeeling blended with the flavour of fresh bergamot (lemon), strong and intensive.
sentences.chinese: 混合了大吉嶺芳香型紅茶，帶佛手柑風味。

sentences.english: Vice Premier Zhang Dejiang has gone to the Zhangjialing mine to supervise the rescue operation.
sentences.chinese: 副總理張德江已經奔赴張家嶺煤礦進行援救監督工作。

sentences.english: Then my brother thought of going to the Darjeeling hills.
sentences.chinese: 之後我哥哥想到大吉嶺去。

sentences.english: Pyrite and quartz are the main gold bearing minerals in Daqingling gold deposit.
sentences.chinese: 黃鐵礦和石英是大慶嶺金礦的主要載金礦物。

sentences.english: The ridge regression method is applied to impedance inversion. The seismic data are divided into a few parts with certain frequency bandwidth in the inversion process.
sentences.chinese: 應用嶺迴歸法對波阻抗反演進行了理論和應用研究。

sentences.english: Sandaoling iron deposit in Liaoyang, Liaoning Province is a lately explored lean iron deposit of Anshan type.
sentences.chinese: 遼陽三道嶺鐵礦是近年來勘探開發的鞍山式貧鐵礦牀。

sentences.english: Steel supports are used to remedy and reinforce the soft broken wall rocks in Yangzhanling tunnel.
sentences.chinese: 羊棧嶺隧道圍巖軟弱破碎，採用鋼支撐進行補強加固。

sentences.english: The best hot spring is in Qixianling.

definition: surname Yun/abbr. for Yunnan Province 雲南省|云南省[Yun2 nan2 Sheng3]
pavilion with a view/high/tall/high fronted, curtained carriage (old)
land used for growing plants/site used for public recreation/abbr. for a place ending in 園|园, such as a botanical garden 植物園|植物园, kindergarten 幼兒園|幼儿园 etc
sunshine/to shine upon/variant of 輝|辉[hui1]
Dongshan county in Zhangzhou 漳州[Zhang1 zhou1], Fujian/Tungshan township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
ode/eulogy/to praise in writing/to wish (in letters)
